Choose Embedded Pairs

dot-choose_embedded_pairs.Rd

Choose embedded pairs for given embeddings of terms and pairs of terms. This function return only the pairs where both terms have embeddings.

.choose_embedded_pairs(term_vectors, terms)

Arguments

term_vectors

A matrix of embeddings of the terms
terms

A list of two character vectors: the first and the second elements of pairs

Value

A list of two character vectors: the first and the second elements of pairs

Examples

inter <- parse_data(interview_1000)
term_vectors <- embed_terms(unique(inter[[1]]$term),
  inter[[2]], embedding_size = 5)
